statements: UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET weight = 75.5 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET height = 175.3 WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET weight = 150.5 WHERE age > 30
UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET height = 175.0, weight = 160.2 WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25
UPDATE user_nutrition_info SET name = 'John Doe', age = 40 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE nutrition_information SET calories = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE meal_plans SET plan_description = 'New Description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE nutrition_information SET protein = 25.5, fat = 15.2 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE nutrition_information SET calories = 500, protein = 20.5 WHERE user_id = 100 AND meal_time >= '2023-01-01 08:00:00'
UPDATE meal_plans SET plan_description = 'New plan description' WHERE user_id = 200 AND plan_name = 'Weight Loss Plan'
UPDATE nutrition_information SET fat = 10.3 WHERE user_id = 100 AND calories > 500
UPDATE Users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE MealPlans SET plan_name = 'New Plan Name', plan_description = 'Updated Description', start_date = '2022-01-15', end_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
